text: Dreamy is the fourth album by indie rock band Beat Happening. ==Track listing== All tracks written by Beat Happening # "Me Untamed" – 3:46 # "Left Behind" – 2:53 # "Hot Chocolate Boy" – 2:21 # "I've Lost You" – 2:48 # "Cry for a Shadow" – 2:27 # "Collide" – 3:29 # "Nancy Sin" – 2:40 # "Fortune Cookie Prize" – 3:46 # "Revolution Come and Gone" – 4:16 # "Red Head Walking" – 2:07 ==References== Category:Beat Happening albums Category:K Records albums Category:1991 albums Category:Albums produced by Steve Fisk
title: Dreamy (Beat Happening album)
